Song.title: Beautiful One
Song.copyright: Tim Hughes © 2002 Thankyou Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [F G Am7 G F G C]
VERSE 1: [F]Wonderful, so w[G]onderful is [C]Your unfailing love Your [F]cross has spoken [G]mercy over [C]me No [F]eye has seen no [G]ear has heard No [C]heart can fully know How [F]glorious how [G]beautiful You [C]are
CHORUS: Beautiful [F]One I [G]love Beautiful [F]One I a[G]dore Beautiful [F]One my [G]soul must [C]sing
VERSE 2: [F]Powerful, so [G]powerful Your [C]glory fills the sky Your [F]mighty works dis[G]played for all to [C]see The [F]beauty of your [G]majesty a[C]wakes my heart to sing How [F]marvelous how [G]wonderful You [C]are
{new_page} VERSE 3: [F]Wonderful, so [G]wonderful You [C]left Your throne of grace To [F]give Your life and [G]set the guilty [Am]free Lord [F]who am I that [G]You would shed Your [C]blood and pardon me How a[F]mazing how [G]beautiful You [C]are
CHORUS: Beautiful [F]One I [G]love Beautiful [F]One I a[G]dore Beautiful [F]One my [G]soul must [C]sing
BRIDGE: And You [F]opened my eyes to Your [G]wonders anew You [F]captured my heart with this [G]love ‘Cause [F]nothing on earth is as [G]beautiful as [C]You
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 wonderful so wonderful is your unfailing love your cross has spoken mercy over me no eye has seen no ear has heard no heart can fully know how glorious how beautiful you are chorus beautiful one i love beautiful one i adore beautiful one my soul must sing verse 2 powerful so powerful your glory fills the sky your mighty works displayed for all to see the beauty of your majesty awakes my heart to sing how marvelous how wonderful you are verse 3 wonderful so wonderful you left your throne of grace to give your life and set the guilty free lord who am i that you would shed your blood and pardon me how amazing how beautiful you are chorus beautiful one i love beautiful one i adore beautiful one my soul must sing bridge and you opened my eyes to your wonders anew you captured my heart with this love cause nothing on earth is as beautiful as you
